section.name: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions
section.p: Please read this carefully before posting in the issue tracker

subsection.name: How can I install InfoQuiver as system demon?
subsection.p: Take a look at the "Java Service Wrapper". It provides the neccessary features to run InfoQuiver as a Windows Service or Unix Daemon.

subsection.name: How can i avoid OutOfMemoryExceptions?
subsection.p:
Edit InfoQuivers start script (InfoQuiver.bat|InfoQuiver.sh) and incease the value for the max. used memory:
java -mx256m -cp %CC_CLASSPATH% net.sf.iquiver.DefaultIQuiverStarter
